update vehicle_gps set date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plateNumber = #{platenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, comId = #{comid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

insert into vehicle_gps (date,plateNumber,lng,lat,comId) values
(#{item.date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.platenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{item.comid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:

from vehicle_gps where date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id
